amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 114-49 and numbered 4 was offered as the Democrat substitute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-49 to provide for tax policies that help the middle class and those working their way into the middle class by raising the take-home pay of hard-working Americans, and rejects the sequester caps to make investments that create jobs for those still seeking work, educate children and prepare them for success.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 264 (Roll no. 139).

action.text: Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Van Hollen.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 264 (Roll no. 139).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Van Hollen.
